text: Ricardo Guillermo Abarca Lowman (born June 1, 1986) is a Mexican actor and singer. Born to Ricardo Abarca Medina and Yasmine Cheyenne Lowman, Ricardo Abarca began his career as a member of the teenage Mexican boy band M5 with whom he released five albums from 2002 through 2009. After a special appearance in the popular telenovela Rebelde, Abarca obtained his first character role in Amores de mercado. == Early years == In 2002, Abarca suffered an accident when he exited a helicopter and waved good-bye to fans.
